titles.title: National Labor Relations Board Ruling Time Limit Act of 1993
A bill to amend the National Labor Relations Act to set a time limit for labor rulings on discharge complaints, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S13278-13279)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

committee.name: Committee on Labor and Human Resources

bill.summary: 10/7/1993--Introduced. National Labor Relations Board Ruling Time Limit Act of 1993 - Amends the National Labor Relations Act to set a time limit for National Labor Relations Board rulings on employee discharge complaints.
